snippet.title: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Kickstarter Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Now live on Kickstarter! Check out the full Kickstarter video here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1617633064/lonely-mountains-downhill?&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=kslaunch&utm_content=trailerVideo


It's just you and your bike versus the rocky peaks of the Lonely Mountains in this arcade-style mountain bike game. Explore unspoiled nature and take on the challenge to find the fastest route down scenic mountainsides. Take the well-worn trail or find your own path down narrow trails and steep cliff jumps. There's no set path to master - just try not to crash!

More info about the game here:
http://lonelymountains.com

Stay in touch:
Discord: https://discord.gg/eFJjpYf
Newsletter: http://lonelymountains.com/newsletter/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LonelyMnts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lonelymountains/
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/711540/Lonely_Mountains_Downhill/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lonelymnts/

Music: Jan Brinker
